Product.Product_Name: Aku La Val GTX Women's Gry 9.5
Product.Long_Description: Inspired by burly mountain bike tires, the Aku La Val GORE-TEX(R) hiking boots will provide you with the tread you need to ascend or descend peaks at outrageous speeds! The entire La Val line is made in Italy and constructed from the highest quality materials. Bring them along on your day hike, weekend trip, or thru hike adventure and feel the quality in every step.

Product.Product_Name: Altra Superior 3.5 Trail Shoes - Women's Gray/purple 7.5
Product.Long_Description: Comfortable enough to wear all day with the performance that you need to tackle any trail, you can't go wrong with these durable shoes from Altra. The Superior 3.5 Trail Shoes feature DuraTread(TM) rubber outsoles that offer epic grip on tame and technical terrain, with a StoneGuard(TM) construction for better protection and a comfortable Zero Drop(TM) Platform for natural alignment.

Product.Product_Name: Altra Superior 4 Trail Running Shoes - Men's Blue/gray 12.5
Product.Long_Description: Wrap your feet in luxurious comfort with these light shoes from Altra. The Superior 4 Trail Running Shoes feature an incredibly supportive wrap-around style with a Quantic(TM) foam midsole for all-day comfort and a MaxTrac(TM) rubber outsole with a TrailClaw(TM) lug pattern for increased traction in a variety of conditions.

Product.Product_Name: Altra Superior 4 Trail Running Shoes - Women's Plum 10.0
Product.Long_Description: Keep your feet happy and comfortable on all of your various trail adventures with these lightweight running shoes from Altra. The Superior 4 Trail Running Shoes feature an incredibly supportive, updated wrap-around style with a cush Altra Quantic(TM) midsole and a FootShape(TM) Toe Box for awesome comfort all day long.

Product.Product_Name: Altra Timp 1.5 Trail Running Shoes - Men's Gray/orange 9.5
Product.Long_Description: Take on all of your favorite trails with ease when you've got these ultra-comfortable shoes from Altra on your feet. The Timp 1.5 Trail Running Shoes feature an updated design with a 4-Point GaiterTrap(TM) to keep out debris and an ultra-grippy DuraTread(TM) rubber outsole for increased traction on all of your adventures.

Product.Product_Name: Altra Timp 1.5 Trail Running Shoes - Women's Dark Blue 10.0
Product.Long_Description: Keep your feet comfortable and protected on all of your various trail running adventures with these light shoes from Altra. The Timp 1.5 Trail Running Shoes features a highly breathable directional mesh upper with a 4-Point GaiterTrap(TM) to keep out debris and an incredibly grippy DuraTread(TM) outsole for increased traction in a variety of conditions.

Product.Product_Name: Altra Lone Peak 4 Trail Shoes Gray/orange 13.0
Product.Long_Description: A new take on Altra's original trail shoes, the Lone Peak 4 Trail Shoes are better than ever. The Lone Peak 4 Trail Shoes feature a highly breathable Quick-Dry Air mesh upper with a FootShape(TM) Toe Box for increased stability, with a MaxTrac rubber outsole and TrailClaw(TM) lugs for epic traction on a variety of terrains.

Product.Product_Name: Altra Lone Peak 4 Trail Shoes - Women's Raspberry 8.5
Product.Long_Description: A new take on Altra's original trail shoes, the Lone Peak 4 Women's Trail Shoes are better than ever. The Lone Peak 4 Trail Shoes feature a highly breathable Quick-Dry Air mesh upper with women's specific Fit4Her(TM) technology, and a MaxTrac rubber outsole with TrailClaw(TM) lugs for epic traction on a variety of terrains.

Product.Product_Name: Altra Wahweap Shoe - Women's Teal/yellow 9.5
Product.Long_Description: Take your journey from the trail to the crag to dinner and dancing in the comfort and style provided by the Wahweap Shoe from Altra. Featuring a 30% hemp upper for comfort and durability, this do-it-all shoe manages to combine modern style with technical performance to give you the support you need on all of your excursions. A Fit4Her(TM) construction provides a custom fit designed particularly for female feet, while the Footshape(TM) toe box encourages toes to spread out naturally for optimal balance. Siped technical multi-surface traction provides superior grip, while the casual design makes the Wahweap ideal for any situation.

Product.Product_Name: Altra Wahweap Shoe Khaki 12.0
Product.Long_Description: The Altra Wahweap Shoe challenges the idea that functional footwear can't be easy on the eyes. Sporting a modern look and equipped with technology to adapt to modern lifestyles, the Wahweap is designed to take you from the trailhead to the crag and beyond. Featuring a soft and comfortable 30% hemp upper that pairs with the 'siped' technical multi-surface traction outsole, the Wahweap is light on foot and grippy as ever. The Footshape(TM) Toe Box allows toes to spread out and give you optimal balance, while the balanced cushioning encourages excellent performance on uneven surfaces. Slip into the Altra Wahweap and keep moving in style, all year round.

Product.Product_Name: Arc'teryx Bora2 Mid Leather Boot Grey Denim/black 9.5
Product.Long_Description: There are so many awesome specs for these burly leather boots that it's basically impossible to talk about all of them. These lightweight boots from Arc'teryx have everything you need to tackle any weather or terrain in comfort. The Bora2 Mid Leather Boots feature a fully waterproof, highly breathable stretch GORE-TEX(R) liner and a Vibram(R) outsole with traction grooves on the edges to give you the support, grip and weather protection you need for all of your outdoor adventures.

Product.Product_Name: Arc'teryx Bora 2 Mid Hiking Boot - Men Black/cajun 12.0
Product.Long_Description: Technology and versatility converge in the Bora2 Mid Hiking Boot by Arc'teryx. Made especially with the male foot in mind, this boot with interchangeable and washable Adaptive Fit liners wears easily in varied terrain, shifting conditions, and fluctuating weather. Breathable, durable, seamless, single-piece thermolaminated upper bans irritation and hot spots. Stretch micromesh, GORE-TEX(R) liner keeps the air moving in warm, dry environments, resists moisture, cushions impact, and conforms to the foot shape. Interchangeable liners (available separately) cradle the foot in all conditions. Vibram(R) outsole plays nice with the EVA molded midsole to deliver a surefooted tread with the stability and protection of a mountaineering boot. Rugged and supportive with a smooth stride...Bora2 Mid Hiking Boot will be your go-to for all hikes and climbs.

Product.Product_Name: Arc'teryx Bora Mid GTX Hiking Boot- Women Raku/lupine 9.5
Product.Long_Description: Love the flexible agility of an approach shoe but wish for the support and durability of a mountaineering boot? Arc'teryx hears you and has developed the Bora Mid GTX Hiking Boot. This women's boot is perfect for multi-day hiking. Arc'teryx Adaptive Fit was obsessively designed with a separate internal, foot-conforming liner which delivers the best fit, helps eliminate irritation and hot spots, and improves breathability. GORE-TEX(R) to the very top edge of the shoe cuff increases waterproof protection. Vibram(R) outsole is hard-wearing and supports the foot with each stride. The custom outsole adapts to varied and mixed terrain due to the surefooted grip, friction bite of the lugs, and the spherical heel design of this women-specific boot. Comfortable, flexible, durable and light weight... pure perfection.

Product.Product_Name: Arc'teryx AR-395A Harness - Men's Pilot/flare Lg
Product.Long_Description: Rock, ice, or anything in between, this versatile harness from Arc'teryx has the performance you need to tackle it all. The AR-395A Harness features awesome Warp Strength Technology(TM) that evenly disperses pressure for increased comfort with loads of flexibility for easier movement and a Burly(TM) Double Weave construction to increase durability.

Product.Product_Name: Arc'teryx AR-385A Harness - Women's Pegasus/titanite Sm
Product.Long_Description: The Arc'teryx AR-385A is a women's specific harness that's perfect for all of your climbing adventures. AR stands for all around, and whether you're into sport, trad, alpine, mixed or ice climbing, this Arc'teryx harness is all about comfort and high performance. This harness features Warp Strength Technology (WST) that evenly supports your weight across the entire harness and has a women's specific fit.

Product.Product_Name: Arc'teryx FL-355 Harness - Women's Poseidon/titanite Md
Product.Long_Description: The FL-355 harness is all about fast, lightweight, versatile comfort. This Arc'teryx harness features Warp Strength Technology (WST) that evenly supports your weight across the entire harness and has a women's specific fit. Sport, trad, alpine, mixed or ice climbing, this harness can handle it all.

Product.Product_Name: Arc'teryx SL-340 Harness - Unisex Pegasus/flare Lg
Product.Long_Description: Sport climbers have a new harness to add to their arsenal of equipment. The SL-340 Harness by Arc'teryx is created specifically for both male and female sport climbers and offers the security, agility and freedom to make for a great climb. Burley(TM) Double Weave wears hard and absorbs little to no moisture, dries quickly and is non-irritating. Warp Strength Technology(TM) Advantage: WST(TM) distributes weight evenly across the entire harness structure from edge to edge, cradling the body. This unique construction hugs the body making this harness highly supportive and even more comfortable over time. Thin reinforcements at the waist belt and leg loops and softened edges make for a smoother transition. Durable, ultra-compact, supple, lightweight, quick drying and comfortable makes the SL-340 an easy choice.

Product.Product_Name: Arc'teryx C40 Chalk Bag Black Md
Product.Long_Description: Durable and highly suitable for the crag, the Arc'teryx C40 Chalk Bag is an idealistic design featuring ample chalk storage, a waist belt, bottle opener and brush holder.

Product.Product_Name: Arc'teryx Aperture Chalk Bag - Large Amethyst Lg
Product.Long_Description: Twist the Arc'Teryx Aperture Chalk Bag open and closed to make up for lost volume as you proceed up the wall. The twisting closure helps to make up for lost volume as well as tightly sealing the bag.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Vapor Helmet Steel Grey S/m
Product.Long_Description: The Black Diamond Vapor Helmet is the lightest and most breathable brain bucket in the lineup. Climb with confidence knowing that this featherlike helmet delivers rugged protection when you need it the most. A low profile design incorporates a Kevlar sheet and carbon rods inside EPS foam to cut down on weight and amp up the defense of your noggin. It is crafted with a geometric design that features open space to set you up with amazing ventilation, and the ratcheting suspension can tuck away into the helmet for more compact storage. Charge up your favorite crag with confidence while wearing the Black Diamond Vapor Helmet.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Chaos Harness Moroccan Blue Sm
Product.Long_Description: Black Diamond says:The Black Diamond Chaos harness is a premium trad climbing harness that's built for long routes and serious abuse. Equally suited to cragging sessions and multi-pitch free climbs, the Chaos features Kinetic Core Construction(TM), which uses a thin layer of Vectran(TM) fibers in place of traditional webbing to evenly distribute weight across the waist and legs. Four pressure-molded gear loops hold cams, slings and on-route essentials, and the front two loops are oversized for optimized racking. A Forged Speed Adjust buckle makes for easy on and off, while the rear 12 kN-rated haul loop secures your tag line.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Vector Helmet Blizzard M/l
Product.Long_Description: When you are making your way up a cliff face in Yosemite, you will need gear that gives you both superior protection and comfort. The Black Diamond Vector Helmet combines lightweight protection with top of the line ventilation and comfort. Perfect for long routes, alpine climbs or other weight sensitive trips, the Vector has EPS foam and a polycarbonate shell for full-coverage protection. The Vector from Black Diamond also features in-mold headlamp clamps and tuck-away suspension for compact storage in your pack. Head out for the adventure of a life time with the Black Diamond Vector Helmet.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Helmet - Womens Dawn S/m
Product.Long_Description: When you are making your way up a cliff face in Yosemite, you will need gear that gives you both superior protection and comfort. The Black Diamond Vector Helmet for women combines lightweight protection with top of the line ventilation and comfort. Perfect for long routes, alpine climbs or other weight sensitive trips, the Vector has EPS foam and a polycarbonate shell for full-coverage protection. The Vector from Black Diamond also features in-mold headlamp clamps and tuck-away suspension for compact storage in your pack. Head out for the adventure of a life time with the Black Diamond Vector Helmet.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Zone Harness Curry Xl
Product.Long_Description: Whether you're into sport or alpine climbing, this ultra lightweight harness from Black Diamond has a minimal design that's perfect for letting you focus on your more complicated climbs. The Zone Harness features highly breathable stretch woven outer fabric with a contoured fit for all day comfort and multiple pressure-molded gear loops with a speed buckle for extra easy in and out.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Zone Harness - Women's Dark Caspian Lg
Product.Long_Description: Lightweight and breathable with loads of performance, the Zone Harness from Black Diamond is a climbers dream come true. This ultra comfortable harness features a contoured, women's specific fit with Fusion Comfort Technology for support and a highly breathable, super stretchy waistbelt.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Camalots All Sizes Gray #4
Product.Long_Description: The gold standard for camming units, the Camalots' double-axle design allows retraction of larger cam lobes, giving them a much larger expansion range than traditional single-axle units. Because loading forces are shared between both axles, this design has the strength to work as a full-strength cam stop, allowing the cam to function as passive pro if it walks back into a wider part of a crack and umbrellas. This is the third generation of BD Camalots and they just keep getting better-they are 30-percent lighter than the originals, the cable loop and trigger are easy to grab, and Black Diamond's slings are large enough to manipulate with gloves on.Features:Double-axle design30-percent lighter than the original Camalots.3 71 G (2.5 OZ) .4 82 G (2.9 OZ) .5 97 G (3.4 OZ) .75 116 G (4.1 OZ) #1 134 G (4.7 OZ) #2 158 G (7.1 OZ) #3 201 G (7.1 OZ) #4 278 G (9.8 OZ) #5 381 G (13.4 OZ) #6 557 G (1 LB 4 OZ)

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Lotus Harness - Womens Fig Lg
Product.Long_Description: Get four-season performance with the Black Diamond Lotus Harness for women. Perfect for the year-round climber, has a Dual Core XP Construction with a breathable OpenAir wasitbelt and separate bands of webbing and support. the Lotus Harness is specifically designed to fit the female form and features Pre-threaded Forged Adjust waistband and leg loops to easy adjustment to accommodate layering in the cold weather. The Lotus by Black Diamond has pressure-molded gear loops, ice clipper slots and a 12 kN rated haul loop.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Aspect Harness Deep Blue Sm
Product.Long_Description: Get four-season performance with the Black Diamond Aspect Harness. Perfect for the year-round climber, the Aspect Harness features Black Diamond's Dual Core XP Construction: a waistbelt with two bands of webbing around the frame and EVA foam. The Aspect Harness has 4 Ice Clipper slots for all your tools and screws, 4 pressure-molded gear loops and a 12 kN-rated haul loop. Pre-threaded Forged Speed Adjust buckles accommodate layering when it get's cold out. The Aspect Harness also has Bombshell abrasion patches, 20 times more durable than standard nylon!

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Camalot X4 Offset Gray/purple .4-.5
Product.Long_Description: The Black Diamond Camalot X4 Offset cam uses a unique machined axled to give more expansion ranger per size than any other four-cam on the market. The six different sizes of Camalot X4 covers the same range as eight sizes of similar units. The cable is protected by an aluminum sheath and the hot-forged trigger bar and symmetric swage eliminate buckling and increase handling ability.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Aura Harness - Women's Cirrus Blue Md
Product.Long_Description: Aura is built for sport climbing with its pre-threaded forged speed adjust waistbelt and kinetic core construction. The Kinetic Core Construcion evenly distributes weight across your waist and legs while the Four pressure-molded gear loops keep all of your essential equipment at your fingertips.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Solution Harness - Women's Octane Lg
Product.Long_Description: Performance, durablity and comfort all come together in this women's specific harness from Black Diamond. The Women's Solution Harness features Fusion Comfort Technology(TM) that offers awesome load distribution to reduce pressure in sensitive areas and has a contoured fit with a women's specific rise to give you full range of movement on all of your adventures.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Couloir Harness Ultra Blue Xs/s
Product.Long_Description: The Black Diamond Couloir Harness is a super-light and packs down incredibly small and can even fit in most jacket pockets when packed down. Featuring durable and light Bluesign approved hydrophobic materials, ample gear loops and a full-strength belay loop. The Couloir Harness is comfortable, practical and ready to rock!

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Half Dome Helmet Blizzard S/m
Product.Long_Description: The old classic gets a new redesign. Black Diamond's most popular climbing helmet, the Half Dome now features an improved fit and even more weight savings than the original. Perfect for everything from trad cragging to alpine expeditions, the Half Dome offers the protection you need with the features you want. The rear wheel adjuster allows for quick, precise, and comfortable fitting. There's even headlamp clips so you can not worry about your Spot sliding off when you're making that last push during an evening send. The Half Dome is the most durable of Black Diamond's helmets, which means it's among the most durable in the world. No matter the problem, the Half Dome has got you covered.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Express Ice Screws N/a 13 Cm
Product.Long_Description: The easiest and fastest placing ice screws on the planet, the Express ice screws have a quicker bite than a pissed- off pit bull thanks to their sublime tooth geometry. The Express screws feature a tapered tube where the teeth cut a hole just larger than the tube itself, for less friction and faster placements. The foldable speed-drive knobs are color-coded for quick length identification and offer uninterrupted 360-degree motion. Stainless steel hangers with secondary clip-in points for belay organization are lighter than previous models, reduce melt-out on sunny routes and won't rust. Express ice screws are built in five lengths to accommodate a variety of ice conditions.Features:Sublime tooth geometryTapered tubeColor-coded foldable speed-drive knobsStainless steel hangers10 cm 10 kN (2248 lbf) 115 g (4.1 oz) 13 cm 10 kN (2248 lbf) 134 g (4.7 oz) 16 cm 10 kN (2248 lbf) 148 g (5.2 oz) 19 cm 10 kN (2248 lbf) 168 g (5.9 oz) 22 cm 10 kN (2248 lbf) 180 g (6.3 oz) CE-certifiedPatented

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Venom Teck Pick No Color One Size
Product.Long_Description: The CEN-B certified Black Diamond Venom Tech Pick has a reverse curve design that is proficient in high angle penetration.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Momentum Harness Astral Blue Lg
Product.Long_Description: Black Diamond calls the Momentum Harness the most popular choice for all-around use, featuring four gear loops, trakFIT(TM)-adjustable leg loops and an ultra-comfortable waistbelt.From Black Diamond:A pre-threaded Speed Adjust waistbelt buckle saves time and eliminates error when tying in, while Dual Core Construction(TM) puts an emphasis on comfort, even when you're posted up at a hanging belay. TrakFIT(TM) leg loops easily adjust for cool fall days at the crag or blazing summer days on long multi-pitches, and four pressure-molded gear loops and a haul loop make this our most popular all-rounder.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Momentum Harness - Women's Caspian Lg
Product.Long_Description: With a comfortable waistbelt and a women's specific design, it's no wonder the Momentum is one of the most popular harnesses in the Black Diamond collection. The Momentum harness features extra easy to use trakFIT leg adjustments with a women's specific rise and a Dual Core Construction(TM) for increased comfort.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Wiz Kid Harness Nightshade Ea
Product.Long_Description: Have a little monkey in the house? Put him in the Black Diamond Wiz Kid Harness and point him to the nearest rock wall. The Wiz youth harness has all the technical features of the adult size harness, including the lightweight Dual Core Construction providing comfort and breathability and the trakFIT leg loop adjustment for practically instant and easy leg loop adjustability. Your monkey will love the feel of this Wiz Kid Harness, and you will love the quality and performance.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Dirt Bag Gloves Natural Xs
Product.Long_Description: The versatile Black Diamond Dirt Bag Gloves are constructed with durable goat leather and 100gm fleece liners. Knit cuffs help keep heat in to increase comfort during frigid days on the hill or just milling around town.

Product.Product_Name: Boreal Blade Climbing Shoes Red 7.5
Product.Long_Description: Asymetrical shoe with a slight down curve at the toe. Due to the rigidity at the toe it offers positive support on all types of foot holds. Precison and fit defines this model. Perfect for sport climbing and bouldering where a low profile toe is required for small pockets and edges.Features:490 gr. pair. Size 6 u.k.High quality split leather upperReinforced double velcro closureIntegrated padded mesh tongue for comfortRubber reinforcement across the toesCanvas linedHalf stiff midsole with anatomic cutawayBoreal FS-QUATTRO soleThickness: 4 - 4.6 mm depending on sizeIRS sole and heelSlip-lasted construction

Product.Product_Name: Camp XLC Nanotech Semi-Auto Crampons N/a One Size
Product.Long_Description: The XLC Nanotech Semi Automatic Crampons fit over your specialty mountaineering boots and feature twelve points, the front two are made from Sandvik Nanoflex stainless steel. Nanotech feature a semi-automatic binding have feature a 3D shaped frame to maximize strength and performance.

Product.Product_Name: CAMP Jasper CR3 Harness Red Xl
Product.Long_Description: When it comes to safety, nothing can beat the Camp Jasper CR 3. With auto-locking steel buckles on the waist and legs, you will get a perfect fit. This climbing harness comes with No-Twist belay loop to withstand the heavy pressure of climbing. Thanks to the innovative sliding waist belt, the Jasper CR 3 can be adjusted with ease for convenience and safety. It is designed with 6mm EVA foam padding for experiencing maximum comfort while hiking. It also includes haul loop to keep the second rope or chalk bag for long adventures.

Product.Product_Name: CAMP Flint Harness Nero/verde Lg
Product.Long_Description: Climb the highest cliffs without fear using the Camp Rock Climbing Flint Harness. It features auto-locking buckles on the waist and legs for a secure fit. Adjustable leg loops and drop seat buckles add to the comfort and support. With patented No-Twist belay loop, the Flint is prepared to take on high pressure. It comes with 6mm EVA foam padding that offers maximum comfort for hours. Thanks to the 4 webbing reinforced gear loops along with haul loop, you can carry all the essential gears easily.

Product.Product_Name: Camp Air CR Harness No Color Sm
Product.Long_Description: The Camp Air CR EVO Harness is the ultimate equipment for any of your ice climbing or rock climbing adventures. Lightweight and reliable, the harness is made with an edge-load construction that keeps the unit light, whereas the smart cut with 3mm perforated EVA foam and 3D mesh offers plush comfort for longer duration. External mesh prevents signs of wear and tear. The 4 webbing reinforced gear loops offer easy access to gears, while the 3 hub accessory attachments can be used to rack screws.

Product.Product_Name: Danner Mountain Light II 5" Boots Brown 11.5
Product.Long_Description: The Danner Mountain Light II 5" Boots are locally handcrafted and feature top-grain leather construction. Featuring GORE-TEX lining, the Mountain Light II 5" Boots are an ideal waterproof design for taking on Pacific Northwest trails, rain or shine. Featuring Vibram(R) outsoles with total traction ideal for taking on the trails.

Product.Product_Name: Danner Mountain 600 Hiking Boots Brown/red 13.0
Product.Long_Description: The Danner Mountain 600 Hiking Boots were designed with the Pacific Northwest in mind. Their lightweight construction is based upon the combination of a new Vibram(R) SPE midsole with Fuga outsoles that feature self-adjusting lugs to handle the most rugged terrain. Their suede leather upper material forge a strong bond with Danner Dry waterproof liners to ensure your feet stay dry throughout. Ortholite footbeds help maximize comfort in all settings while its DPDX low profile last helps you transition from trail to ale without skipping a beat.

Product.Product_Name: Danner Mountain 600 4.5" Hiking Boots Walnut/green 11.5
Product.Long_Description: Keep your feet happy on your next mountain adventure with these burly hiking boots from Danner. The Mountain 600 4.5" Hiking Boots feature a removable Ortholite footbed with a Vibram SPE midsole for all-day comfort and an ultra grippy Vibram Fuga outsole.

Product.Product_Name: Danner Adrika Hiker Boots - Women's Sienna 10.0
Product.Long_Description: Style and comfort come together in these burly boots from Danner. The Adrika Women's Hiker Boots have a streamlined, modern design with a suede upper and features removable Ortholite footbed for allday comfort with a moisture wicking Danner(R) Dry liner and a grippy Adrika outsole.

Product.Product_Name: Danner Jag Hiking Boot Brown/khaki 9.0
Product.Long_Description: Add durable all-day comfort to your next hiking adventure with these classic boots from Danner. The Jag Hiking Boots have a heavy-duty design that's perfect for the trail with '80s inspired style and feature a removable Ortholite footbed with a cushioning EVA midsole and a grippy waffle outsole.

Product.Product_Name: Danner Jag Hiking Boot - Women's Monks Robe/bossa Nova 10.0
Product.Long_Description: Keep your feet happy and comfortable on all of your outdoor adventures with these classic boots from Danner. The Jag Hiking Boots feature a lightweight heavy-duty nylon construction with an EVA midsole and a removable Ortholite footbed.

Product.Product_Name: 5.10 Blackwing Climbing Shoes - Women's Pink/blue 6.0
Product.Long_Description: The women's 5.10 Blackwing Climbing Shoes are designed with a Cowdura upper material and feature stealth HF rubber, microfiber linings and a detuned profile for maximum comfort and performance.

Product.Product_Name: Keen Targhee III Waterproof Mid Hiking Boots - Women's
Product.Long_Description: With an updated look and award winning performance, these tried and true favorites from Keen are everything that you've been looking for. Featuring Keen.Dry waterproof technology with an all-terrain rubber lug outsole for increased traction, and a comfortable, odor free EVA footbed, the Targhee III Waterproof Mid hiking boots are the perfect blend of comfort and versatility for all of your trail adventures.

Product.Product_Name: Keen Targhee III Waterproof - Women's Alcatraz/blue Turquoise 9.5
Product.Long_Description: Take on any terrain in comfort and style with these updated hiking shoes from Keen. Featuring Keen All Terrain rubber outsoles for increased traction in a variety of conditions, with a comfortable odor-free EVA footbed and a breathable Keen.Dry waterproof membrane, the Targhee III Waterproof shoes are an outdoor lovers dream come true.

Product.Product_Name: Keen Targhee Vent - Women's Fumo/quiet Green 9.5
Product.Long_Description: Don't let the heat keep you from your favorite trails when you have these incredibly comfortable, highly breathable shoes from Keen. The Targhee Vent Shoes feature an updated mesh panel design for better air flow, with an EVA footbed that conforms to your foot for all day comfort and an all-terrain rubber outsole.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Trango Cube GTX Blue/red 45.5
Product.Long_Description: The ultra light sole and midsole in the La Sportiva Trango Cube GTX make this shoe the most advanced in the Trango Line. The seamless and waterproof upper make for an abrasion resistance surface while the integrated removable tongue and soft stretch fabric provide optimal comfort. The outsole consists of La Sportiva's One sole by Vibram, making this shoe not only durable, but lightweight as well.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Trango S Evo GTX Mountaineering Boots - Women's Blu 39.0
Product.Long_Description: The LA Sportiva Trango S Evo Gtx super light climbing boot for women offers a fully synthetic 3-season alpine companion to keep you from going off the walls with everyday life and scaling them instead. Designed to be waterproof and semi-automatic crampon ready, the LA Sportiva Trango boot boasts a nimble and precise performance to give you the leg up in your ascents. In doing just that, the Trango S Evo Gtx boot utilizes Vibram Mulaz oustsole tech that gives you a spider-like stick to the web, or wall that is to say, by the application of Supertrek Rubber. More so, with 3D Flex ankle tech providing for optimal ankle mobility -- you will be more capable than ever in undertaking those highly technical routes. In addition, the LA Sportiva Trango S Evo Gtx boot makes efficient use of a variety of other tech components, including: Gore-Tex lining, Cordura Waterproofing with idro treatment, and Micropore PU/TPU crampon reinforcement as well. What's stopping you now? That's right, now would be a good time to climb some walls!

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Karakorum Boots Green 41.0
Product.Long_Description: Constantly begging for abuse, the La Sportiva Karakorum Boot is always prepared to take a beating. These leather bad boys are expertly crafted to be ideal for whatever backpacking or mountaineering adventures are on your horizon. Whether you are scrambling up a wicked incline on your way to base camp, or on a weeklong trek with a bag strapped to your back, you are guaranteed a comfortable and supportive experience. Water repellant and crazy durable, there isn't anything the Karakorum can't handle. A tapered 8mm dense Nylon delivers a smooth flexing experience throughout the boot so that your foot gets a nice, consistent step no matter how many you have to take. The Idro-Perwanger leather upper locks out water, but is still highly breathable and durable. Aiding in insulation and cushion, the SBR Aircushion delivers comfort in all climates. Perfect for carrying you from sun up till sun down for days at a time over all kinds of adverse terrain, the La Sportiva Karakorum Boot is ready to show you what performance is all about.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Trango Extreme EVO Light GTX Boots Silver 41.0
Product.Long_Description: All synthetic, waterproof and insulated; the silver bullet is the perfect lightweight, warm technical mountain boot for ice climbing, mixed climbing and cold weather alpine pursuits. The completely rigid 6-7mm HP3 midsole accepts automatic crampons and is great when standing on edges when out of your crampons. The 3D Flex ankle hinge allows side to side movement for better footwork while still providing longitudinal lockout when front pointing.Features:Weight: 30.51 oz, 865 gLast: TrangoConstruction: Board LastedUpper: Water-repellant Cordura(R) with Idro-treatment/ Flex Tec 2/ Water-repellant Lorica(R) with Antiacqua external coating/ Double Vibram(R) rubber randsLining: Gore-Tex(R) Insulated Comfort FootwearInsole: 9mm insulating Ibi-ThermoMidsole: 6-7mm HP3Sole: Vibram(R) Lavaredo (Sticky Supertrek Rubber)

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Glacier WLF Tan 41.0
Product.Long_Description: The Glacier WLF by La Sportiva is a heat resistant hiking boot perfect for post fire cleanup or forest management work. These boots are not designed for firefighting, because the soles contain a heat activated glue that delaminates in temperatures above 100 degrees celsius. The sole itself is resistant up to 300 degrees celsius. In accordance with federal standards for forest firefighting, the Glacier WLF boots meet the minimum height requirement of 8 inches. A Dry-Best(R) lining keeps the feet comfortable. They also have a PU Aircushion midsole for comfort throughout long hours spent standing and walking.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Trango Cube GTX - Women's Mal Blue/yel 39.5
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Trango Cube GTX is one of La Sportiva's more technically advanced mountain shoes. Cube for women features a seamless, waterproof upper and protective rand along with an integrated removable tongue made from a soft stretch fabric for ultimate comfort. This is the boot you will want on your next mountaineering adventure.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva TC Pro Climbing Shoes Sage 37.5
Product.Long_Description: La Sportiva's TC Pro is the perfect climbing shoe for big walls, crack climbing and face climbing. This shoe is designed to provide excellent edging without sacrificing any crack climbing ability. It has a mid-height design with thin ankle and above the toe padding for protection in cracks. The TC Pro is also made with the patented P3(R) platform design and a flat fit at the toes for sensitivity and comfort. It features side perforations and ventilated tongue. The upper is made of leather and the sole is made of Vibram(R) rubber for excellent grip on sharp edges.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Synthesis Mid GTX Hiking Boots - Women's Fjord 38.5
Product.Long_Description: Featuring GORE-TEX Surround technology, the women's La Sportiva Synthesis Mid GTX sets the bar for high performance footwear in their Fast Hiking Series. 360 degree breathablity coupled with a women's specific Tempo last, STB stabilizing technology and Nano Cell technology have created a monster that maximizes waterproofing, breathability and fit so you can focus in and enjoy the environment you're in.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Solution Climbing Shoes White/yellow 35.5
Product.Long_Description: Looking for a solution to your climbing shoe woes? La Sportiva has created an ultra gripping Vibram XS sole paired with their signature power platform for ideal hook on the wall. A true upgrade is offered no matter the terrain with the Solution Climbing Shoes.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Skwama Blackyellow 44.5
Product.Long_Description: Designed specifically with boulderers or competition climbers in mind, the Skwama is an ultra technical climbing shoe that can't be denied. The Skwama features a patented s-heel construction that keeps your heel from slipping, a secure hook-and-loop closure system, a sticky rubber toe patch for scums and split sole construction that allows for awesome grip on even the smallest of edges.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Kataki Ocean/sulphur 39.5
Product.Long_Description: A versatile addition to your climbing arsenal, you can't go wrong with this high performance Kataki from La Sportiva. The Kataki features a patented S-Heel(TM) construction for better performance on a variety of terrains with differentiated lacing for a more precise fit and P3(R) patented technology.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Kataki - Women's Mint/coral 39.5
Product.Long_Description: This high performance climbing shoe from La Sportiva is a versatile addition to your arsenal. The Kataki is perfect for steeper routes and more technical climbs with an asymmetrical shape for more power, a slip lasted construction and a Patented S-Heel(TM) for better heel hooking maneuverability in a variety of situations.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Skwama - Women's Applegreen 36.5
Product.Long_Description: La Sportiva says:The comfort of a slipper coupled with the snug fit of a hook and loop closure, the Skwama Women's promises precision and performance. Stand-out features like the P3(R) rand design to minimize stretch, S-Heel(TM) construction for secure heel hooks and extra rubber over the top forefoot for toe hooks and scumming make this elite-level shoe built to deliver exacting control on the most technical routes and boulder problems.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Miura Climbing Shoes Lime 42.0
Product.Long_Description: In the line for over 10 years, the Miura is the perfect tool for performance footwork whether it be on slabs, vertical or overhanging steep rock. The high tensioned slingshot rand is tied into the powerhinge on the sole so that when small edges are weighted the shoe stretches in the back half of the shoe and not in the front. This allows you to stick on the smallest edges you can find or imagine! The multi-paneled lining gives you the perfect fit and the speed lacing system laces up in a cinch. A superior La Sportiva climbing shoe, the Miura excels at hard rock climbing, power edging, pockets ... pretty much whatever you want to put it through.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Miura Shoes - Women's White 36.0
Product.Long_Description: As a long-standing staple in the La Sportiva lineup, the Women's Miura Climbing Shoe is the Swiss army knife of climbing footwear. These puppies are perfect for sticking to the smallest edges imaginable and do absolute work in cracks, on boulders, or under the steepest pitches. Thanks to the slingshot rand and the powerhinge in the sole, this foot hugger stretches towards the back half, rather than the front so you can exercise the most pristine edging. A multi-panel lining provides an incredible fit, and speed lacing gets you on the rock quicker. With the La Sportiva Women's Miura Climbing Shoe, there is no climb you can't conquer.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Mythos Climbing Shoes Terra 43.0
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Mythos is a versatile climbing shoe designed to fit almost everyone. The combination of unlined leather uppers with Vibram XS Soles and La Sportiva's patented Mythos Lacing System allows you to dial in your desired fit so you can climb in absolute comfort.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Mutant Carbon/flame 41.5
Product.Long_Description: Tackle any terrain that the mountain sends your way with these aggressive mountain running shoes from La Sportiva. The Mutant features an Integrated Fusiongate(TM) Technology lacing harness with high frequency reinforcement to give you the best fit possible with a super sticky FriXion(R) XF outsole and sublime cushioning to keep your feet happy all summer long.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Maverink Flamesulphur 35.5
Product.Long_Description: La Sportiva says:The Maverink is a customizable No-Edge(TM) Technology slipper designed to deliver technical performance for younger climbers while reducing constricting forces on the foot. The patented No-Edge(TM) concept brings your foot closer to the rock for better edging performance, increased sensitivity and more homogeneous wear. The P3(R) platform gives you the downturned power needed for hard boulder problems.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Wildcat 3.0 Shoes - Women's Turquoise 42.5
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Wildcat 3.0 Shoes are a trail running and hiking design that make long runs in the back country a comfortable delight. Mesh construction provides ultimate breathability and a technical look while gripping traction provide support even when the terrain gets rough. You'll be keeping up with the cougars and cheetahs in the Wildcat 3.0 Shoes by La Sportiva.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Wildcat - Mens Carbon/flame 44.0
Product.Long_Description: If you're looking for a comfortable, top of the line trail running shoe then look no further than the La Sportiva Wildcat. This shoe features a FriXion X-Axis rubber outsole that gives you excellent traction on a variety of surfaces, whatever the trail holds, this shoe has got you covered. The Wildcat is also La Sportiva's most cushioned trail shoe, the midsole uses LaSpEVA 2.4 mm lasting board to give you the best cushioning and stability possible. If you're looking for comfortable dependability then look no further than the Wildcat trail running shoe.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Wildcat Trail Running Shoes - Women's Grey/butter 40.5
Product.Long_Description: The women's specific La Sportiva Wildcat Trail Running Shoes are built on a Tempo last and feature a FriXion(R) X-Axis rubber outsole for incredible comfort and control. Coupled with their Impact Brake System(TM) and medium-wide fit, the Women's Wildcat from La Sportiva helps you get in and out in a hurry.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Tarantula Climbing Shoes Kiwi 39.5
Product.Long_Description: This comfortable shoe is easy to use and easy to get on and off in a flash. The unlined upper is excellent for moisture management and super comfortable on your foot all day. The shape is round and higher volume for the climber not looking to mangle their feet yet aggressive enough to perform when it is needed. The highly adjustable closure system adapts to multiple foot types and shapes.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Tarantula Climbing Shoes - Women's Coral 38.5
Product.Long_Description: A versatile addition to any entry-level climber's arsenal, this all-around women's climbing shoe from La Sportiva is well worth checking out. The Tarantula Climbing Shoes feature an unlined leather upper for all-day comfort with sticky FriXion(R) rubber soles and a beginner-friendly asymmetrical shape.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Miura Vs Shoes - Women's Ice Flower 35.0
Product.Long_Description: A high performance hook and loop closure shoe for amazing edging control and pocket climbing performanceEasy to use hook and loop closure system for easy on and off convenience. Slingshot rand and Powerhinge system gives you the ultimate edging power. 4mm Vibram(R) XS Edge and XS Grip2 (Women's model) sticky rubber outsole Features:WEIGHT: 8.23 oz/ 228 g LAST: WPD 75 CONSTRUCTION: Slip Lasted UPPER: Leather LINING: Dentex, unlined underfoot MIDSOLE: P3(R) with 1.1mm LaspoFlex SOLE: 4mm Vibram(R) XS Grip2

Product.Product_Name: Lowa Camino GTX Flex Hiking Boot Dark Grey/blk 8.5
Product.Long_Description: The Lowa Camino Flex GTX Boot softens the beating your feet might endure on those long distance treks and adventures. In reducing the strain your feet experience, the Lowa Camino Flex GTX boot incorporates 2.2mm Nubuck leather for upper-ankle stabilization. Additionally, Gore-Tex waterproof lining allows for some much needed circulations so your feet can breath while you run them through the gauntlet. More so, the sole unit incorporates a Vibram Apptrail outsole that utilizes a self-cleaning tread for a consistently superior treed and traction for downhill descents while the PU midsole provides additional support cushioning to maximize the comfort in each step. Unique to the Lowa Camino Flex GTX boot, X-lacing provides for two-zone lacing complete with locking eyelets that give a premium fit for the heel while ensuring instep stability as well. With so many comfort and performance attributes you can finally forget about beating the feet and instead give the ground a beating while you enjoy the trek with Lowa's Flex GTX! The Journey is half the adventure, now you can concentrate on enjoying it!

Product.Product_Name: Lowa Camino GTX Hiking Boots Dark Gray/black 10.0
Product.Long_Description: The Lowa Camino GTX Hiking Boots are made for the backpacker looking to log long hours on the trail. Their FreeFlex design, heel stabilizer and forefoot shank maximize flexibility and comfort without sacrificing stability or durability while a waterproof and breathable GORE-TEX membrane coupled with Nubuck leather and a Vibram App Trail outsole ensure your feet stay protected inside and out, making your backcountry adventure a more free flowing and pleasant experience.

Product.Product_Name: Lowa Camino GTX Dark Grey/black 11.5
Product.Long_Description: Comfortable, durable and ready for anything, the Camino GTX shoes from Lowa are a must have for any trekking adventure. The Camino GTX features a waterproof GORE-TEX(R) with a Balance Comfort footbed and Lowa Flex(R) lacing that reduces pressure on your feet while still being super easy to lace.

Product.Product_Name: Lowa Renegade Pro GTX Mid Hiking Boots Brown/red 12.0

Featuring Climate Control footbeds and PU Monowrap Frame midsoles for increased performance and comfort that lasts the entire adventure.

Product.Product_Name: Lowa Renegade GTX(R) Mid Hiking Boot Sepia/sepia 10.5
Product.Long_Description: Since 1997, the Renegade has been the Lowa standard for practically every outdoor activity.Lowa says:With our signature DuraPU(TM) midsole, MONOWRAP(R) frame construction and a full-length stabilizer for stability and support underfoot, Derby-cut vamp design for an easy, accommodating fit and a VIBRAM(R) Evo sole for sure-footed traction, it's no wonder that the Renegade GTX(R) Mid has been our best-selling style for over 20 years.

Product.Product_Name: Lowa Renegade GTX(R) Mid - Women's Stone 9.5
Product.Long_Description: Lowa says:Since 1997, the Renegade's acclaimed fit, comfort and versatility have set the benchmark for multifunction boots. With our signature DuraPU(TM) midsole, MONOWRAP(R) frame construction and a full-length stabilizer for stability and support underfoot, Derby cut vamp design for an easy, accommodating fit and a VIBRAM(R) Evo sole for sure-footed traction, it's no wonder that the Renegade GTX(R) Mid has been our best-selling style for over 20 years.

Product.Product_Name: Mammut 9.8 Eternity Dry Climbing Rope Standard Ocean/fire 60m
Product.Long_Description: Dry treated, bi-patterned, and the perfect diameter to take plenty of falls but not weigh you down, the Mammut Eternity Dry is the ideal jack-of-all trades climbing rope. Make it your go-to or add to your existing selection. Available in 60- and 70-meter lengths.

Product.Product_Name: Mammut Galaxy Protect 10.0 Standard Fire/orange 70m
Product.Long_Description: The Galaxy Protect 10.0 from Mammut is a great abrasion resistant, and durable single rope that is built to withstand a wide variety of climbing situations. From indoors to outdoors this 10mm diameter rope is one you can rely on.

Product.Product_Name: Mammut Genesis Dry 8.5MM Climbing Rope Standard Yellow/orange 60m
Product.Long_Description: Calling all mountaineers, ice climbers, long route lovers, and rope drag haters, the Mammut Genesis just might be your safety solution. With double or twin ropes, you can give your climbing partner half the rope weight on the approach, and rappel down twice as fast, talk about efficiency! Additionally, Mammut Dry technology will extend the life of your rope, while maximizing performance, safety, durability, and handling comfort.

Product.Product_Name: Mammut 8.0 Phoenix Dry Climbing Rope Standard Blue 30m
Product.Long_Description: The Mammut 8.0 Phoenix Dry Climbing Rope is a quality constructed, Swiss made rope catered towards a multitude of climbing styles. From multi-pitch to mixed terrain the lightweight design of the 8.0 Phoenix Dry won't let you down.

Product.Product_Name: Mammut 9.8 Eternity Classic Emerald/caribbean 60 M
Product.Long_Description: Mammut says:The 9.8 Eternity is the first choice when a versatile rope with perfect handling is required. Three different treatment categories can be selected depending on the intended uses. In the PROTECT line it is also available with BiCo Sense technology.

Product.Product_Name: Mammut Togira Slide Harness - Womens Highway/barberry Sm
Product.Long_Description: The Mammut Togira Slide Climbing Harness for women offers the maximum in comfort. The Togira features Mammut's special two-part webbing construction, two-layer foam construction, a patented tie-in protector to prevent abrasion damage, 4 specially shaped gear loops, 3 ice screw carabiners and a strong haul loop.

Product.Product_Name: Mammut Togir Slide Harness Smoke/yolk Xl
Product.Long_Description: A versatile all-rounder, specially designed to be comfortable during wear and suspension. The three Slide Bloc buckles offer a wide selection of adjustments, it is the ideal companion for all types of rock and ice climbing.Climbing harnesses are actually quite simple pieces of equipment, easy to use and quite safe if used correctly. But your life hangs on your harness, which is why you should always make sure that you use it in the correct manner. A safety routine will help you to avoid mistakes.

Product.Product_Name: Mammut Rock Rider Helmet White/smoke 52-57cm
Product.Long_Description: Protect your most important gear: your head. The Mammut Rock Rider climbing helmet offers off superior climbing protection with an extremely light in-mold core, so it's still comfortable to wear. The Mammul Rock Rider is designed for a wide range of climbing: from sports climbing to high-altitude tours and ice climbing. For hotter days, the helmet's 16 vent system helps keep you comfortable when you start to work up a sweat. The Mammut Rock Rider: because a helmet can be the difference between a good climb and your last climb.

Product.Product_Name: Mammut El Cap Climbing Helmet White/iron 52-57cm
Product.Long_Description: Protect your most expensive piece of equipment: your head. The Mammut El Cap climbing helmet features a high-tech design that will keep you safe while cutting down on unnecessary weight. The El Cap climbing helmet is made with a hard plastic shell and a shock-absorbing 2K-EPS foam core. The helmet's 12 vent system will keep you comfortable when your out climbing in amazing sunny weather.

Product.Product_Name: Mammut Togir 3 Slide Harness Pine Xl
Product.Long_Description: The Mammut Togir 3 Slide Harness offers an all around climbing design that features state of the art technology. Featuring laminated split webbing technology that eliminates extra weight from excess padding while still offering comfort. Featuring four overmolded gear loops and a self-locking buckle.

Product.Product_Name: Mammut Togir 3 Slide Harness - Women's Serpentine Lg
Product.Long_Description: The Mammut Togir 3 Slide Harness is an all around, women's specific design that features split webbing technology that eliminates unnecessary weight from padding while still keeping things comfortable and breathable.

Product.Product_Name: Mammut Ophir Speedfit Lava/iron Xl
Product.Long_Description: The Mammut Ophir Speedfit will support you in all of your vertical pursuits. Designed ideally for gym climbing, with its extreme breathability and comfort, the Ophir Speedfit will also excel on the rock or ice. Whether you're on a via ferrata adventure, sport climbing, alpine climbing, or ice climbing, the four gear loops and two ice-screw carabiner loops will provide you with the gear space you need. With Mammut's innovative and novel Speedfit buckle system, never again will you have floppy webbing getting in your way.

Product.Product_Name: Mammut Ophir Speedfit Womens Dark Magenta/iron Sm
Product.Long_Description: Extremely comfortable, breathable, and adjustable, the women's specific version of the Mammut Ophir Speedfit climbing harness will hug your hips and keep you safe during all of your vertical endeavors. The Ophir Speedfit is ideal for gym climbing, but will absolutely excel on the rock, ice, and in the alpine. Additionally, all of your floppy leg loop webbing problems will be solved by Mammut's innovative Speedfit adjustment system.

Product.Product_Name: Mammut 9.5 Infinity Protect Climbing Rope Standard Caribbean/marine

Balanced and efficient, the Infinity Protect 9.5 is a favorite of the Mammut Pro Team and is sure to be yours as well. Try it out to see why it will be your next go-to climbing rope.

Product.Product_Name: Mammut Wall Rider Climbing Helmet Surf 56-61cm

An ergonomic design treats your head to comfort and protection while large vents provide bountiful breathability. Avoid the risk of injury and keep it moving while wearing the Wall Rider Climbing Helmet from Mammut.

Product.Product_Name: Merrell Chameleon 7 Mid Waterproof - Women's Merrell Stone 6.0

The Chameleon 7 Mid Waterproof Boots have a durable Nubuck suede construction with a breathable M Select(TM) DRY impermeable membrane that seals out the elements and features a comfortable EVA midsole with air cushioning in the heels for shock absorption and a grippy Vibram(R) TC5+ outsole.

Product.Product_Name: Merrell Chameleon 7 Mid Waterproof Boulder 11.0

Product.Product_Name: Merrell Moab 2 Mid Waterproof Hiking Boots - Women's Navy Morning 9.5

Product.Product_Name: Merrell Moab 2 Waterproof Hiking Boots - Women's Falcon 7.0

Product.Product_Name: Merrell Moab 2 Mother of All Boots(TM) Ventilator - Women's

Product.Product_Name: Merrell Siren Sport Q2 Mid Waterproof Shoes - Women's Crown Blue 5.5

Product.Product_Name: Merrell Siren Sport Q2 Shoes - Women's Black/liberty 6.0

Product.Product_Name: Merrell Moab 2 Mid Waterproof Beluga 11.5

Product.Product_Name: Metolius Safe Tech Waldo Harness Ea Sm

Product.Product_Name: Petzl Vasak Leverlock U Crampon Ea Os

The only things the METEOR does not protect against, are unfortunate but rare meteors, so perhaps watch out for those.

Product.Product_Name: Petzl Paw Rigging Plate Assorted Sm

Product.Product_Name: Salewa Mountain Trainer Mid Gore-Tex Boots - Women's Magnet 7.5

Vibram(R) Alpine Approach outsole, Nylon mid-stiff insole, highly wear-resistant suede leather, 360 degree full rubber rand, and GORE-TEX(R) Extended Comfort lining means you'll not want for comfort in these rock scrambling, high mountain, snow and ice, mud and grass, mixed terrain, or "iron road" shoes.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa Alp Trainer Mid GTX Hiking Boot - Women's Black Out/agata 10.0

Put is all together in one shoe and you've got the incredible Salewa Alp Trainer Mid Gore-Tex hiking boot.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa Firetail 3 GTX - Women's Smoke/iowa 7.0

Product.Product_Name: Salewa Firetail 3 Shoes Black Olive/papavero 8.0

Product.Product_Name: Salomon Quest 4D 3 GTX(R) Wren/bungee Cord 11.0

Light and cushioned with running shoe-adapted technology, yet supportive enough for backpacking, this boot helps you get to the next camp site with happier feet.

Product.Product_Name: Salomon X Ultra 3 Mid GTX(R) - Women's Crown Blue 8.0
Product.Long_Description: Salomon says:Specially designed to accommodate women, the best selling X Ultra Mid 3 GTX(R) has evolved into an even more effective hiking shoe. Thanks to Descent Control technology, this shoe efficiently tackles technical hikes and really shines during tough descents. Wear this pair and head downhill with a spring in your step, even in wet conditions.

Product.Product_Name: Salomon X Ultra 3 Mid GTX(R) Bk/india Ink 11.5
Product.Long_Description: Salomon says:The X Ultra 3 Mid GTX(R) has evolved into an even more effective hiking shoe thanks to Descent Control technology that efficiently tackles technical hikes and really shines during tough descents. Wear this pair and head downhill with a spring in your step, even in wet conditions.

Product.Product_Name: Salomon Speedcross 4 GTX Black/black 10.0
Product.Long_Description: With an aggressive grip and a precise foothold, the Speedcross 4 GTX from Salomon are a trail runners dream come true. Featuring a Sensifit(TM) system that cradles your foot for a more secure fit, a comfortable OrthoLite(R) foam sockliner, a waterproof/breathable GORE-TEX(R) construction and a Wet Traction Contagrip(R) outsole, the Speedcross 4 GTX shoes will keep your feet comfortable and protected in a variety of conditions.

Product.Product_Name: Salomon XA Pro 3D GTX(R) Shoe Navy Blaze/hawaiian 12.5
Product.Long_Description: To keep you moving, even on the wettest, most rugged trails, the all-weather XA Pro 3D GTX trail running shoe from Salomon features serious traction and support as well as waterproof / breathable Gore-Tex(R) technology.

Product.Product_Name: Salomon XA PRO 3D CS WP Trail Running Shoe - Women's Shadow/bk/artic
Product.Long_Description: These runners are designed to handle whatever Nature throws at you on the trail. A rubber toe cap and Climashield waterproofing help keep weather out, while Salomon's 3D Advanced Chassis(TM), quick-lace system, and a grippy outsole provide solid support and traction during your runs.

Product.Product_Name: Salomon XA Pro 3D CS WP Shoes Black/black/magnet 13.0
Product.Long_Description: Incredible fit and durability, the Salomon XA Pro 3D is perfect for trail running or long hikes. The Ortholite sock liner provides a cool and dry environment for the foot while the 3D Advanced Chassis between the midsole and outsole gives you more control and foot security.

Product.Product_Name: Salomon XA Pro 3D - Women's Stormy Wea/le/eggshell 8.0
Product.Long_Description: An icon, the Salomon XA Pro 3D spells adventure in practically every condition. Premium Wet Traction Contagrip(R) provides improved traction on slick trails, while the 3D Advanced Chassis(TM) offers comfort and stability. Grab this classic and get on the trail!

Product.Product_Name: Salomon Outline GTX Hiking Shoes Ebony/bistre/pearl Blue 10.5
Product.Long_Description: Stay comfortable and protected on all of your outdoor adventures with these burly hiking shoes from Salomon. The Outline GTX Hiking Shoes have a slim, athletic inspired style with sneaker like comfort and features 5mm deep lugs on the outsole for unparralled grip, with a full GORE-TEX(R) membrane, and a light weight design.

Product.Product_Name: Salomon Outline GTX Hiking Shoes - Women's Trellis/navy Blaze 9.5
Product.Long_Description: With all the comfort of your favorite pair of sneakers and the performance that can only come from GORE TEX, you're sure to love these burly hiking shoes from Salmon. The Women's Outline GTX Shoes have a slim, athletic inspired style with 5mm deep lugs for epic traction and features a fully weatherproof GORE-TEX membrane to keep your feet protected in a variety of conditions.

Product.Product_Name: Salomon Speedcross 5 Trail Running Shoes - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Make your next trail running adventure as comfortable as possible with these legendary trail shoes from Salomon. The Speedcross 5 Women's Shoes feature an ultra grippy Contagrip outsole that can handle a variety of terrains, with a molded Ortholite sockliner for all-day comfort, and a high rebound EnergyCell+ midsole.

Product.Product_Name: Salomon Sense Ride Navy Blaze/bright Mar 13.0
Product.Long_Description: For premium comfort and support on long trails, the Salomon Sense Ride is built with a natural rocker profile and Contagrip(R) sole to keep you on your feet and moving through your entire run. The Sense Ride also features Salomon's Profeel Film chassis, linking the rear part of the shoe to the forefoot for stability throughout the shoe.

Product.Product_Name: Salomon Speedcross 5 GTX Shoes Navy Blaze/stormy 11.0
Product.Long_Description: The Speedcross 5 GTX Shoe is the latest iteration of the legendary Speedcross line, and is chock full of the necessary technology and features that make it a favorite in the running community. Featuring a Contagrip(R) TA outsole and a GORE-TEX membrane, these ultra grippy and durable can take as much as you can dish out at them while the SensiFit(TM) lacing system provides a completely customized fit all around the foot. See why the Speedcross line of shoes is so widely renowned by stepping into the Speedcross 5 GTX and experiencing the next step in training footwear.

Product.Product_Name: Salomon Speedcross 5 GTX Shoes - Women's Burnt Olive/crown Blue/india
Product.Long_Description: For game changing performance no matter where the trail takes you, lace up the Salomon Speedcross 5 GTX shoes and head to the great outdoors. See why the fandom of the Speedcross lineup has never wavered with performance boosting features like GORE-TEX weather protection, Contagrip(R) TA precision grip and SensiFit(TM) customized upper construction. Get the perfect fit and challenge not-so-perfect conditions with this run-anywhere-at-anytime shoe and see what the fuss is all about.

Product.Product_Name: Salomon Sense Ride 2 Running Shoes Stormy Weather/ebony/black 11.5
Product.Long_Description: Experience next-level comfort and performance when you hit the trail in the Sense Ride 2 Running Shoes from Salomon. A daily driver for runners worldwide, the Sense Ride 2 performs just as strongly as they look, and with the Contagrip(R) MA outsole and Profeel Film Chassis, you'll be able to protect your feet while enhancing your performance. Throw in 3D Mesh ventilation and SensiFit(TM) technology and you've got a breathable, customized running shoe that you can wear for years to come.

Product.Product_Name: Salomon Outline Shoe - Women's Hydro/atlantis/medieval 7.5
Product.Long_Description: The Salomon Outline Shoe breaks down any obstacles getting in between you and outdoor adventure. Built with a slim, athletic style and offering the comfort of a traditional sneaker, this performance shoe focuses on comfort so that you can focus on the road ahead. Suitable for any variable degree of terrain, the Outline offers durability and comfort in equal proportions to ensure that you and your feet arrive at your destination happy. From the bluffs to the bar and everywhere in between, the Salomon Outline shoe will get you there in style and comfort.

Product.Product_Name: Salomon Yalta TS CSWP Winter Hiking Boots Phantom/beluga 11.0
Product.Long_Description: Just because the year is coming to an end doesn't mean that your outdoor adventures have to. The Yalta TS CSWP Winter Hiking Boots from Salomon encourage you to get outside any time of year to get the most of what nature has to offer. The rugged yet sophisticated Yalta's offer superior comfort and protection from winter weather due to a Contagrip(R) MD rubber outsole that offers substantial grip on solid and unpredictable surfaces. A waterproof ClimaSalomon(TM) bootie system blocks all incoming moisture, while the Thinsulate(R) insulated membrane keeps you feeling nice and toasty. Keep it moving all year with the Yalta TS Boots from Salomon.

Product.Product_Name: Salomon Yalta TS CSWP Winter Hiking Boots - Women's Balsam/urban 7.0
Product.Long_Description: The Yalta TS CSWP Winter Hiking Boots from Salomon are eager to get outside and play, no matter what the forecast is calling for. Due to a lightweight and flexible ClimaSalomon(TM) inner booty that blocks winter weather is addition to an EnergyCell midsole to provide abundant impact protection, the Yalta is truly comfortable in any scenario. Contragrip(R) MD rubber outsoles provide lasting durability and reliable traction whether the surface is hard and smooth or soft and loose. Tread with confidence and embrace the cold in the Salolom Yalta TS CSWP Winter Hiking Boots and get out while the weather's nasty!

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Charmoz Mountain Boots - Women's Orange 46.0
Product.Long_Description: Rock, ice, or snow, these technical alpine shoes from Scarpa can tackle your next mountain adventure with ease. The Charmoz Mountain Boots have a lightweight design that's perfect for weight-sensitive excursions and fast paced days and features a waterproof construction, with a moisture wicking Outdry(R) liner and a grippy Vibram(R) outsole.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Charmoz - Women's Blue 41.0
Product.Long_Description: Rock, ice, or snow, these burly boots from Scarpa can handle three seasons worth of technical alpine weather and conditions with ease. The Charmoz Mountain Boots have a lightweight design that's perfect for weight-sensitive excursions and fast paced days and features a waterproof construction, with a moisture wicking Outdry(R) liner and a grippy Vibram(R) outsole.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Charmoz Pro GTX Mountaineering Boots - Women's Silver/dahlia
Product.Long_Description: Pink doesn't necessarily mean delicate and the Scarpa Charmoz Pro GTX Mountaineering Boot for women is definitely NOT a boot to be giggled at. Made to be durable yet still lightweight, the Charmoz Pro incorporates an abrasion resistant, reinforced, synthetic leather Nylon L-Tech upper and a Gore-Tex(R) waterproof liner that wicks away moisture and remains breathable for all-day stomping around comfort. For added kick, Scarpa includes a Vibram(R) TT Lite outsole for superior grip and stability along with a hybrid crampon binding system for those snowy mountain treks. And all this in a totally synthetic construction makes this a vegan friendly boot. Durable, cozy, rugged, and reliable, you'll never look at pink the same way again.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Vapor V Rock Climbing Shoe - Men's Ocean/yellow 43.0
Product.Long_Description: The perfect blend of comfort and performance, it's no wonder these versatile climbing shoes from Scarpa are a best seller year after year. The Vapor V Climbing Shoes feature a microfiber upper with a Bi-Tension(TM) active rand and Vibram(R) XS Edge outsoles.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Instinct VS Rock Climbing Shoe Black/orange 42.0
Product.Long_Description: Ideal for a wide variety of styles and skill levels, these versatile shoes from Scarpa are sure to become an essential part of your arsenal. The Instinct VS Climbing Shoes have a softer design with a thinner, more flexible Vibram(R) XS Edge rubber outsole that resists deformation when you're on critical holds, and features the Bi-Tension(TM) active randing system offers maximum toe power, whether you're bouldering or sport climbing.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Instinct VSR Rock Climbing Shoe Black/azure 37.0
Product.Long_Description: A great shoe for lighter climbers, the Instinct VSR from Scarpa is a touch more flexible than the award-winning Instinct VS. It features Vibram(R) Grip2 rubber and a closer fit across the forefoot, without sacrificing a sock-style fit and lightly asymmetrical last, so it's still perfect for hard climbing.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Vapor V Rock Climbing Shoe - Women's Turquoise 36.0
Product.Long_Description: The Vapor V is a best-selling shoe from Scarpa and is known for its precision and versatility. This women's version also features an asymmetric, downturned fit and Bi-Tension randing for power and precision, as well as a stretch-gusseted airmesh tongue and Vibram(R) XS Edge rubber.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Force V Rock Climbing Shoe - Women's Ifall/mred 40.0
Product.Long_Description: The Force V combines technical details with a less aggressive last for a shoe that offers all-day comfort as well as performance. This women's version also features Dual Powerstrap Closure, lightly charged V-Tension(TM) active randing, technical and flat-lasted construction, and Vibram(R) XS Edge rubber.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Stix Climbing Shoes Silver 39.5
Product.Long_Description: With the base construction of the Scarpa Mago but with a stretched panel over the foot and a Reinforced Elastic Band for a snug and precise fit, the Scarpa Stix is one slipper that will keep you climbing high. Excellent for overhangs, bouldering, cranking hard, sport and face routes, this high performance shoe is the lightest Scarpa makes at only 180 grams. X-Tension Active Randing provides energy and support with its foot-cradling design. Vibram(R) XS Grip 2 improves grip yet provides plenty of firmness for hooking and moderate edging and performs in all temperatures. The Scarpa Stix is the closest to climbing with bare feet you can get.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Origin Rock Shoes Iron Grey 34.0
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Origin Rock Shoes are a great beginning climbing shoe. They feature a fine 1.8mm suede leather upper with a Flexan 1.9mm midsole and Scarpa's versatile Vision Rubber outsole. A hook and loop closure system keeps your feet tucked in while a flat profile ensures that you develop on a platform that maximizes comfort.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Origin Rock Climbing Shoes - Women's Green Blue/smoke 40.5
Product.Long_Description: Perfect for beginning climbers, these versatile shoes from Scarpa are a good place for all of your future climbing adventures to start. The Origin Climbing Shoes feature a cushy leather upper with a flat profile for increased comfort and Scarpa's grippy Vision rubber outsole.
